trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Yakima
There were no other sightings in Yakima on or around November 3rd 1993
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: sighting details my self and my friend took a drive to rimrock lake where we go to 4 wheel and we was parked facing the lake at the egde of the water motor was turned off we was talking it was dark and all the sudden about 300 feet out in front of us there it was we was kinda freaked out but excited at the same time my friend said what is that i said i dont know he said start the blazer it wouldnt start for a min it never does that but it finally started we slowly started to back up and it got much closer so i steped on the gas goin in reverse turned the back of my blazer south and kept going and it fallowed so that freaked us out and i took off towards a trail that went into the woods we drove about 1\4 of a mile then my friend noticed a silver glowing ball right next to his window i seen it too but it was not the same thing we seen befor that i kept driven threw this wooded trail and it kept fallowing us then all the sudden we was on the other side of the lake missing 3 hours of time not knowing or understanding what happend.
Summary: A friend and my self was up in the woods ay rimrock lake sitting in my blazer talking and there it was out of no where
